title: Memcache module enabled
name: Acquia:MemcacheEnabled
description:
You can use the Memcache module to move some common cache queries out of the
database and into memory. Information held in memory will always be retrieved
more quickly than information retrieved from a database query.

Memcached is available for all Acquia Cloud websites. See Using Memcached for
information about how to use Memcached with an Acquia Cloud-hosted Drupal
website.
remediation: Install and enable the memcache module into your codebase.
